definition: Zhoushan prefecture level city in Zhejiang (consisting solely of islands)/formerly Dinghai 定海
lit. to break the cauldrons and sink the boats (idiom); fig. to cut off one's means of retreat/to burn one's boats
cross a river in the same boat (idiom); fig. having common interests/obliged to collaborate towards common goals
lit. to push the boat with the current/fig. to take advantage of the situation for one's own benefit
Zhoushan prefecture level city in Zhejiang (consisting solely of islands)/formerly Dinghai 定海
lit. in the same boat under wind and rain (idiom); fig. to stick together in hard times
lit. navigating a boat against the current (idiom)/fig. in a tough environment (one needs to work hard)

sentences.english: My boat is sailing in brisk pace and the wind is blowing my clothing happily.
sentences.chinese: 舟遥遥以轻飏，风飘飘而吹衣。

sentences.english: A furnace atomizer with the V-shaped boat was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种V型舟石墨炉原子化器。

sentences.english: Rousseau would lie down in the boat and plunge into a deep reverie.
sentences.chinese: 而自己常卧于舟中，陷入深深地遐想。

sentences.english: The faeries, boat, you do not cross or crossing?
sentences.chinese: 仙灵做舟，你渡还是不渡？

sentences.english: There can be associated injury to the scapholunate ligament.
sentences.chinese: 可能合并舟月韧带损伤。

sentences.english: I cut a large tree, and spent over three months shaping it into the form of a boat.
sentences.chinese: 我砍一棵大树，并花了三个月以上塑造成舟的形式。

sentences.english: All above rental cost only applicable on training purpose.
sentences.chinese: 所有以上租用价钱只适用于训練龍舟用途。

sentences.english: An old man just row a boat five minutes ago.
sentences.chinese: 刚刚有个雅美老人划著拼板舟过去。

sentences.english: Canoe is actually an Arawak word.
Boats not only existed in Shang Dynasty, but also in the surrounding countries.
sentences.chinese: 舟不但商王国有，周边的一些方国也有。

sentences.english: The tug boat will tow the ship away for the safety of the port in case of emergency.
sentences.chinese: 再紧急状况下可以让拖轮将舟拖走，保证港口安全。

sentences.english: After water, then roll cast from the swirl of the boat, but right.
sentences.chinese: 经过水漩，则掷荐投之，舟乃无恙。

sentences.english: I study in Dezhou English - Chinese Bilingual School.
sentences.chinese: 我在得舟英汉双语学校上学。

definition: sail/Taiwan pr. [fan2], except 帆布[fan1 bu4] canvas
to ride the wind/to use a fair wind/to take an opportunity
to set sail/to brave the waves
Blue Dragon, other name of the Azure Dragon 青龍|青龙 (the seven mansions of the east sky)
scull (single oar worked from side to side over the stern of a boat) (free word)
(of an expanse of water) vast/distant and indistinct/tiny or insignificant
